name: Prototype Crescent
r1: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 36% for 10s.
r2: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 45% for 10s.
r3: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 54% for 10s.
r4: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 63% for 10s.
r5: Aimed Shot hits on weak points increase Movement SPD by 10% and ATK by 72% for 10s.
